name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Sakura Card Hen ~Sakura to Card to O-Tomodachi~
name_original: Cardcaptor Sakura: Sakura Card Hen ~Sakura to Card to O-Tomodachi~
description:
Game is based on the second half on the anime of the same title.
Player is able to enjoy lively animated world as Sakura. There is a "Sakura gauge" system to help gather the cards.
